title: What's Coming Up
items: Major job transition -- change is in the air, even if I can't tell what that smell is just yet (lol)
More life. More happiness. More personal pride.
Maybe a quick trip to Cass, WV to check out the Shay locomotives
Or… maybe a trip somewhere out west. I've never been west of Cincinnati, OH
Updating my resumé + prepping for whatever's next
